title: Ribbon Samples, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain compound satin
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Three samples of broad ribbon. Plain satin ground fabric with fine gold lattice work forms background for repeat of vignette enclosing deer and peacock. Both selvages present on all samples.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ribbon Samples, ca. 1920.
ca. 1920. Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain compound satin. Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg. 1938-82-112-a/c.
